review: Its a great alternative to 'cable free'. However, I think more developement can be done on the options available. I have a Galaxy 4s and have a number of apps on my phone that I'd like to watch on my Samsung Smart TV. ie: CW, A&E;, Food Network. I thought this device would give me the option to do that. Also, I had no idea what channels the device offered until after I got it. Add more channels!!!
author: Dereka Hendon

review: Before my purchase, there was confusion between Chromecast and the Roku streaming stick. I already have a Sony Blu-ray player for Netflix and Hulu. I chose chromecast because of its ability to cast Chrome browser tabs and mirror desktop screens- a feature I use quite often and one which Roku and the Sony blu-ray players lack. In my tests, the tab mirroring worked perfectly without any lags or buffering issues. Chromecast, being a google product, promises to introduce new apps on a regular basis. Hulu, Netflix and Youtube work perfectly regadless of whether you are using an ipad, android tablet or laptop. Setting chromecast up was breeze. Overall a great product for everyone.
